com.tinkerpop.rexster

Class RexsterApplicationGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tinkerpop.rexster.RexsterApplicationGraph

  • public class RexsterApplicationGraph
extends Object
    Holds a graph and its assigned extensions. This wrapper is what is supplied to the RexsterResourceContext to be passed to extensions and other Rexster resources.
    Author:
    Stephen Mallette (http://stephen.genoprime.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getGraphName

        public String getGraphName()
        Gets the name of the graph as supplied in rexster.xml as part of the configuration.
        Returns:
        the name of the graph

      • getGraph

        public com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Graph getGraph()
        Gets the graph instance itself.
        Returns:
        the graph instance.

      • getUnwrappedGraph

        public com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Graph getUnwrappedGraph()
        If this graph is an instance of WrapperGraph, this method recursively unwraps the graph to get its base implementation. For purposes of Rexster, graph wrapping occurs when the graph is marked as read-only in rexster.xml.
        Returns:
        the unwrapped graph.

      • tryGetTransactionalGraph

        public com.tinkerpop.blueprints.TransactionalGraph tryGetTransactionalGraph()
        Helper method that will attempt to get a transactional graph instance if the graph can be cast to such.
        Returns:
        the transactional graph or null if it is not transactional

      • isTransactionalGraph

        public boolean isTransactionalGraph()
        Determines if the graph is transactional or not.
        Returns:
        true if transactional and false otherwise.

      • tryCommit

        public void tryCommit()
        Stops a transaction with success if the graph is transactional. If the graph is not transactional, the method does nothing.

      • tryRollback

        public void tryRollback()
        Stops a transaction with failure if the graph is transactional. If the graph is not transactional, the method does nothing.

      • isExtensionAllowed

        public boolean isExtensionAllowed(ExtensionSegmentSet extensionSegmentSet)
        Determines if a particular extension is allowed given configured allowables from rexster.xml. Ensure that loadAllowableExtensions is called prior to this method.

      • findExtensionConfiguration

        public ExtensionConfiguration findExtensionConfiguration(String namespace,
                                                String extensionName)
        Gets an extension configuration given a namespace and extension name.
